text: Denis Vitalyevich Koberskiy (; born 24 February 1974 in Khabarovsk) is a former Russian football player. His father Vitali Koberskiy is a coach and a former player. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Sportspeople from Khabarovsk Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Luch Vladivostok players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Oryol players Category:FC Okean Nakhodka players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Denis Koberskiy
